author: Eliza Mackintosh, CNN
title: What you need to know about coronavirus on Friday, April 3
description: As global cases cross the 1 million mark and an international battle to procure life-saving equipment mounts, President Donald Trump has invoked a Korean War-era law to force the production of ventilators, N95 masks and other vital supplies.
content:
A version of this story appeared in the April 3 edition of CNN's Coronavirus: Fact vs. Fiction newsletter. Sign up here to receive the need-to-know headlines every weekday.
